actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to apply certain provisions of the Fishermen's Protective Act of 1967 to situations in which vessels of the United States or their gear are damaged by actions of foreign countries.

summary.text: Authorizes the reimbursement by the Secretary of the Interior to owners of fishing vessels for damage to the vessel and gear and for income loss caused by the actions of foreign nations, under the Fishermen's Protective Act. Sets forth the criteria for entitlement to such reimbursement.

titles.title: A bill to apply certain provisions of the Fishermen's Protective Act of 1967 to situations in which vessels of the United States or their gear are damaged by actions of foreign countries.
